interpretation: The "speaking head" emoji represents communication, expression, and the sharing of ideas. This card is a reminder to speak your truth and be heard. It can also indicate the need to actively listen and be open to the perspectives of others. The "speaking head" encourages clear and effective communication, as well as the use of language to create connection and understanding. This card can also represent public speaking, storytelling, or other forms of performance. Be mindful of the words you choose and the impact they may have on those around you.
